text: Goodou ala e mmaadagu ge hagalongo gi Dimaadua, hagalongo gi nnelekai a Maa, “Idimaa goodou ala e manawa dahi mai gi di Au, hunu daangada donu o au daangada e hai baahi adu gi goodou, e de hiihai e buni adu gi goodou. Digaula e hagahuaidu goodou ge helekai boloo, ‘Dugu anga gi Dimaadua gi hagamodongoohia dono aamua e haga dagaloaha goodou, gi gidee gimaadou goodou e tenetene.’ Malaa, digaula la ga haga langaadia!
